dc:title: Seattles C. W. House Has Many Activities
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Short vignette about the House of Hospitality in Seattle, a cooperative house of unemployable men, and a generous family's little farm.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 359 1940-05-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
